questionTitle: He enjoyed the dessert so much that he accepted a second ________ when it was offered.
He put a ________ against the tree and climbed up to pick the apples.
The Dorchester is one of London's most ________ hotels.
Some drivers seem to expect everyone else to get ________ their way.
It's ________ long time since he last saw his brothers and sisters.
The dentist told him to open his mouth ________.
He left home more than an hour ago. He ________ be at work by now.
I ________ you wear the blue coat rather than the pink one.
When we were in London we went on a few short day ________ to some famous places.
The blue curtains began to ________ after they had been hanging in the sun for two months.
Arthur seems calm enough, but he has a very violent ________.
It's five years ________ I went to England.
They can only cure him ________ his illness if they operate on him.
I believe ________ taking my time.
He is not only indifferent to other people; he is often extremely rude ________ them as well.
You demand too much ________ him; he is not really equal to the task.
The branch unexpectedly gave ________ and the surprised cat found herself suddenly on the ground.
Betty saw her little brother ________ after his dog.
If you ________ Tom, tell him to come and see us on Friday.
Our magazine ________ in May if we receive all the articles on time.
